author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower floor insulation tips…I use Rockwool between joists. I also place it between drain pipes. This keeps the floor warm, reduces noise from running water, and makes it more comfortable to use. For more tips visit homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#insulation #showerdesign #showerremodel #diy #homerenovation
title: Shower Floor Insulation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
